mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT surveyGroupNo,cateName,quesName,manager,surveyDate,type,answer,dissatisReason,satisVal,companyName FROM survey JOIN company ON survey.companyNo = company.companyNo group by surveyGroupNo ORDER BY surveyGroupNo DESC

SELECT surveyGroupNo,cateName,quesName,manager,surveyDate,type,answer,dissatisReason,satisVal,companyName FROM survey JOIN company ON survey.companyNo = company.companyNo WHERE survey.surveyGroupNo = #{surveyNo} group by companyName ORDER BY surveyDate DESC
SELECT COUNT(quesName) FROM survey WHERE surveyGroupNo = #{surveyNo} AND type = 1 group by companyNo
SELECT satisVal FROM survey WHERE surveyGroupNo = #{surveyNo} group by companyNo
